org.apache.http.conn.params
类 ConnRouteParamBean

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.http.params.HttpAbstractParamBean
      org.apache.http.conn.params.ConnRouteParamBean

public class ConnRouteParamBean
extends HttpAbstractParamBean

Allows for setting parameters relating to connection routes on HttpParams. This class ensures that the values set on the params are type-safe.
